ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 122
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I just wanted to clarify that I have never used an exploit in my EQ life and I am not planning to do so in the future. I was just against the idea. But
ygData.messageBody:
Gooey Smalls wrote:
>
> From: "Gooey Smalls" <smullins@...>
>
> More power to any of you cheaters/exploiters out there, if any of you want
> to trade exploit information, my email address is here. I play a druid, and
> whomever said we only do 96 at lvl 22, is wrong, we do 97 so ha...we can
> anything we want except druids, bears and wolves, and wizards are only good
> for 2 things, stealing kills, and root and shoot...that's it, nothing else,
> period, end of story...that's why i went to druid...kiting is a little
> better, not much, but a little. Once again, i know about 8 exploit areas,
> good from lvl 9 to 25...any info on others will be rewarded...and the GM's
> can blow me, they really, really can.
>

I just wanted to clarify that I have never used an exploit in my EQ life
and I am not planning to do so in the future. I was just against the
idea. But then I realized that ignorant idiots like the above poster
think they have an ally in me, and that really made me sick.

HTH, HAND.

--
Sergey
--

KPS, PUNK (Paramilitary Undercover Nuclear Kamikaze)
